

I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname
                         from customers
                         where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = 'nuffqid2o2g6hpudqnq1ae02j5' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';
